body: Well, as you can probably see, AMAs are very active nowadays on our forums. So, I decided to open my own AMA, where you can ask me anything you want.
body_tagged: Well, as you can probably see, AMAs are very active nowadays on our forums. So, I decided to open my own AMA, where you can ask me anything you want.
title: [AMA] DeliciousShoesHD

replies.body:
Cheesepuffs or cheeseballs? 
Dobby, Leprechauns or Noddy?
Opinions on me? =P
Favourite colour?
Favourite map?
replies.body_tagged:
Cheesepuffs or cheeseballs? 
Dobby, Leprechauns or Noddy?

replies.body:
1. Cheesepuffs
2. Dobby ofc
3. Well myworld6, as far as I know, you are very friendly, good and positive staff members. You can also make me laugh. And as I can see, you love dots, because you always end your statements with a dot xD No offense to you, you're a really good guy <3!
3. Red
4. Well, Luar was my first map when I joined the server, so I choose Luar :)

1. Cheesepuffs

3. Red
4. Well, Luar was my first map when I joined the server, so I choose Luar :)

replies.body:
Hey Jake!

1. "Dead silence" forevah <3
2. Strawberry
3. You're really nice person, we don't really talk that much, but as far as I know, you're a chill guy. You're mature and your behavior is not childish. Think about applying for a staff position.
4. Steven Seagal, I love his fighting techniques..

replies.body:
1. Very very nice person to talk to. You can make my days better whenever I am not in good mood. We chat a lot and we should keep chatting ^.^ You're also responding to my requests whenever you have to and your job is done nicely.

2. "This kid looks like a good player. I should talk to him, to see what his character actually is like."

3. Um, let's say 85/100. I know, I could give you higher rate but that's it for now ;)

4. Ryiley for now :P

5. Probably you, I don't know that many people yet to answer this question but I'll say that's you. I mean I am not chatting a lot with other players except with you.

#ReporterSquad

5. Probably you, I don't know that many people yet to answer this question but I'll say that's you. I mean I am not chatting a lot with other players except with you.

replies.body:
1. You're so awesome and friendly player, we don't talk that much but I wish we could talk more. I think that you're very active player with a lot of potential. Keep it up bruh!

2. Idk about you, but I love some kind of chill/dubstep music, for now I'll go for Oliver Heldens - Fifty shades of grey

3. Pizza <3

4. Currently I am Avicus Moderator ^.^

5. I am 15 years old

6. I live in Slovenia; a small country.

7. Programming websites and Minecraft plugins, moderating on Avicus, drawing and so on =D

ok so..

1) if you were a jam; what flavour would you be?
2) if you could go anywhere in the world for a day; where would you go?

4) what are you favourite hobbies in lyfe?
5) can we be best friends forever and ever and ever and ever and ever an ever and ever and ever and ever and ever and ever and ever and ever?
